channel.title: PHP Search Using Tags?
channel.description:
So, I'm trying to think of a good way to search for a tag or set of tags in a MySQL databse.
The table would look something like: id, someshit, someothershit, tags
Would it be faster to get the entire set from the table, then loop through them to see if the tags field contains one or more of the tags being searched for?
Idk any other ways than that, to be honest.

item.title: PHP Search Using Tags?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Sounds good, sounds good.

I might have found an alternative using the google search, etc.
You can refine it to which site, and maybe down to a certain URL.

It will require some testing ;]

That sounds good though, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: PHP Search Using Tags?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

make a seperate table called tags, or whatever, structure something like
id,tag,otherstuff
then, link the id with the id from whatever table you’re talking about, and store any tags added in the tags table.
if you want to search for tags, you simply search in the tags db and if needed, use sub-querys

Read full topic
